Quickstrike:





Quickstrike looked behind himself, glaring at Stingtra. His face was a 
little uneasy. He's seen that posture before, and it wasn't good news. He 
quickly spun around. "Say, how 'bout you an' me go out on scout patrol, 
huh?" His mouth plate twisted into what was a grin and nodded to her.
